metadata.description: The big-picture view of how well you two fit together

very_low.label: Volatile
very_low.guidance: Treat as intense and draining; name volatility, focus on boundaries and self-protection.

low.label: Rocky
low.guidance: Acknowledge real connection mixed with frequent bumps; talk about patience.

mid.label: Mixed
mid.guidance: Could tilt closer or looser depending on how they both show up.

high.label: Solid
high.guidance: Generally healthy, dependable bond; encourage investing time while naming weak spots.

very_high.label: Seamless
very_high.guidance: Natural fit where things click; invite them to enjoy it with healthy boundaries.
